abstract: The present invention provides a sequence of causes estimation device, etc., with which it is possible to estimate a module that acts as a cause. A sequence of causes estimation device (101) has a sequence unit (102) that sequences modules in accordance with the degree of similarity between a numeric value pertaining to a service provided using a system, and a degree of influence representing the magnitude of an influence exerted upon the service by a module included in the system.
title: SEQUENCE OF CAUSES ESTIMATION DEVICE, SEQUENCE OF CAUSES ESTIMATION METHOD, AND RECORDING MEDIUM IN WHICH SEQUENCE OF CAUSES ESTIMATION PROGRAM IS STORED
